summary: An ordinance relating to the acquisition of property by condemnation in order to acquire the right to make the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting upon 28th Avenue between East Cherry Street and East Union Street, as contemplated by Ordinance No. 85123; authorizing expenditures for the Engineering and Law Departments in connection therewith; and making an appropriation from the Seattle General Arterial Improvement Bond 1954 Fund therefor.
